item.title: AutoMapper 15.1 and MediatR 13.1 Released
item.description: Starting a new policy of regular quarterly releases, today I pushed out new versions of AutoMapper and MediatR:AutoMapper 15.1.0 Release NotesMediatR 13.1.0 Release NotesThe previous versions restored netstandard2.0 support across the board. In these releases, I'm including first-class support for Link to article: https://www.jimmybogard.com/automapper-15-1-and-mediatr-13-1-released/
